entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
